title: Motovilovo
text:
Motovilovo () is a <a href="types%20of%20inhabited%20localities%20in%20Russia">rural locality</a> (a <a href="Village%23Russia">village</a>) in Nizhne-Vazhskoye Rural Settlement, <a href="Verkhovazhsky%20District">Verkhovazhsky District</a>, <a href="Vologda%20Oblast">Vologda Oblast</a>, Russia. The population was 6 as of 2002.
Geography.
Motovilovo is located 12 km southeast of <a href="Verkhovazhye">Verkhovazhye</a> (the district's administrative centre) by road. Stikhovskaya is the nearest rural locality.
